Uses of Package
org.dspace.kernel

Packages that use org.dspace.kernel
org.dspace.kernel The DSpace Services kernel and service manager. 
org.dspace.kernel.mixins Interfaces for interacting with the startup, shutdown, or reconfiguration of the framework. 
org.dspace.servicemanager Register, configure, manipulate services. 
org.dspace.servicemanager.spring Spring extensions and adaptors for DSpace. 
org.dspace.services.caching Implementation of the core Caching service. 
org.dspace.utils Utility classes and starting points. 
org.dspace.utils.servicemanager Handy types to support ServiceManagers. 
org.dspace.utils.servlet Connect a servlet container with the DSpace Services framework, in a web application context. 
 

Classes in org.dspace.kernel used by org.dspace.kernel
DSpaceKernel
          This is the most core piece of the system: instantiating one will startup the dspace services framework.
ServiceManager
          Allows for non-specific access to the core services.
 

Classes in org.dspace.kernel used by org.dspace.kernel.mixins
ServiceManager
          Allows for non-specific access to the core services.
 

Classes in org.dspace.kernel used by org.dspace.servicemanager
CommonLifecycle
          Beans that have a lifecycle and can be controlled via their lifecycle implement this interface.

          This is the most core piece of the system: instantiating one will startup the dspace services framework.
